intro: Any kid in Sunday school can give you the highlights of Daniel's story. What do you know about him?

questions.ask: What illegal activity resulted in Daniel being thrown into the lion's den?
What are the better-known names of Daniel's friends Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah?
What miraculous sign, interpreted by Daniel, foretold the doom of King Belshazzar?
What was the composition of the feet of an enormous statue in King Nebuchadnezzar's dream - explained by Daniel?
What angel appears twice in the story of Daniel to explain the prophet's visions?

intro: They call it an "exocism" - making a demon (or demons) leave a possessed person. Kind of creepy, huh? It happened a lot in Bible times - how many do you recall?

questions.ask: What kind of animals rushed into a lake and drowned after receiving demons cast from humans?
What name did a wild man, possessed by many demons, give in answer to Jesus's question?
How many demons were cast out of Mary Magdalene?
What "skill" did a young slave girl lose when Paul cast a demon from her?
What specific activity did Jesus sometimes forbid to newly cast-out demons?

intro: Long before the Titanic tragedy or the San Francisco earthquake, there were major disasters in the Bible. Tell us what you know about these five.

questions.ask: What widespread lack of food forced the patriarch Isaac to leave his home and move to another country?
WHat swarming insects stripped Egypt of every green plant in the eight plague called down by Moses?
What transportation disaster befell the apostle Paul as he was traveling to Rome to stand trial before Caesar?
What fraction of Earth's population is killed by the horses and riders of the Revelation's sixth trupet judgment?
What collapsed and killed eighteen people in a "news event" that Jesus used to encourage repentance?

intro: There's a set of quotation marks around that D, so you already have a clue as to how the answers to these five questions begin.

questions.ask: What kind of bird, released from the ark, brought an olive leaf back to Noah?
What substance did God use to form the first man?
What prophetess, the wife of Lappidoth, was a judge of Israel?
What did scoffers accuse the disciples of when they spoke in tongues at Pentecost?
What Philistine idol fell over and broke in pieces when the ark of the covenant was placed nearby?
